summary: This is an email chain from December 2008 discussing that Jeffrey Epstein and a victim are both incarcerated at the Palm Beach County Stockade, causing distress to the victim who wants to be moved. The emails are between federal prosecutors and victim attorneys, and include a request for court transcripts where the judge ordered Epstein to stay away from victims.

persons.name: Amy Eden
persons.context: Appears to be forwarding information about Epstein's incarceration at the Palm Beach County Stockade to others in the email chain.

persons.name: Katherine W. Ezell
persons.context: An attorney representing clients (victims) who requests copies of court transcripts where the judge ordered Jeffrey Epstein to stay away from victims.

persons.name: Amy
persons.context: Mentioned by Katherine Ezell as someone who may have relayed information; appears to be part of the legal team.

persons.name: Robert C. Josefsberg
persons.context: Addressed in the email chain, appears to be part of the legal team representing or in contact with a victim.

persons.name: Amy Ederi
persons.context: Listed as a recipient in the email chain, likely part of the legal or prosecutorial team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document states he is incarcerated at the Palm Beach County Stockade, and a victim is distressed to learn they are both at the same facility.

connections.description: Work together as attorneys; Katherine references that Amy may have relayed information.
Both are addressed in the same email as part of the legal team discussing victim representation.
The victim is upset to learn Epstein is at the same incarceration facility and wants to be moved.
Katherine Ezell states she is representing clients (victims) and seeks court transcripts for their comfort.

events.title: Epstein and victim incarcerated at same facility
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein and a victim are both at the Palm Beach County Stockade, causing the victim distress and a desire to be moved.

events.title: Work release notification delivery
events.description: A federal prosecutor delivered a work release notification letter to a victim at the Palm Beach County Stockade and provided a copy of the original victim notification letter.

events.title: Palm Beach Daily News articles on work release
events.description: Articles and an editorial were published in the Palm Beach Daily News regarding the work release issue related to Epstein's case.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the Palm Beach County Stockade as of December 2008.
A victim of Epstein was also incarcerated at the same facility, in a different building but on the same campus, which caused her distress.
The victim had never received the original victim notification letter and was provided a copy during a visit by a federal prosecutor.
Attorneys for the victims requested copies of court transcripts where a judge ordered Epstein to stay away from victims.
The email chain involves coordination between federal prosecutors and victim attorneys regarding victim welfare and legal representation.
